content: in this legal case two parties referred to as rr and mr were involved in a dispute over the division of an inherited property rr initiated the lawsuit to dissolve the coownership and accused mr of taking money from their mothers account rr also requested an occupancy fee for the property mr counterclaimed for a refund of renovation expenses the court in parma accepted the division claim and ordered the exclusive ownership of the property to be assigned to rr and mr in separate lots the court divided the movable property assets and ordered mr to pay rr a sum of €452350 the court rejected rrs request for an occupancy fee and mrs counterclaim for a refund of renovation expenses the court also determined the responsibility for the fees of the courtappointed experts the decision was made on december 2 2022

metadata.cost: 4,523.50 EUR of compensation almost 2'000.00 EUR of fees
